Activity: Arrive at work, check emails. Read some articles about game design and economy.
Focus on the economy system.  Design the basic economic model, including how players earn and spend currency. Define the cost of items, crafting recipes, and upgrades.
Consult with @SDEV-1 on how to integrate the economy system with the server backend. Discuss data storage and security considerations.
Lunch Break. Relax a little bit.
Implement a basic currency system. Players can earn currency by completing quests, defeating enemies, or selling items.
Implement a simple shop interface where players can buy and sell items. Use placeholder UI elements for now.
Test the economy system to ensure it's balanced and engaging. Adjust prices and rewards as needed. Gather initial feedback from team members.
